price: អ្នកណាហើយបានងាកចេញពីវា(គម្ពីរគួរអាន) ពិត ប្រាកដណាស់ គេនឹងត្រូវរែកនូវបាបកម្មដ៏ធ្ងន់នៅថ្ងៃបរលោក។
arabic: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: man aʿraḍa ʿanhu fa-innahu yaḥmilu yawma al-qiyāmati wiz'ran
